attributes.action: prosecute any MP found to have fraudulently claimed any allowance or expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should be held to account to taxpayers regarding allowances and expenses.  Any fraudulent claims should be prosecuted in the same way that members of the public would be prosecuted.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
